title: Constant Lag Problems
body: I have recently been having massive problems regarding ping. I used to always get around 50 ping but now in a game it is constantly lag spiking. Occasionally, the lag goes up to 1000 and stays there for a good 5 minutes. Infact, I was testing in a custom game, and the ping went as far as 10,000 ms! There's nothing on my pc that would cause this constant lag spiking, there's nothing downloading when I play.

replies.body:
Just to ensure your local network settings are in fact in a good configuration and not conflicting with League, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) real quick. If you continue to experience issues with your latency in-game, we can further troubleshoot this.

Please let me know if you run into any issues with those steps.

I actually just created another discussion about this same exact issue. I have run through the connection guide but am still experiencing the issues. If you or OP have other suggestions, please let me know. My issue seems isolated to the 7.3 update.
